text.text_translated:
Zoos bring people and animals together.
They can teach people why it is important to protect animals.
This can make people want to help animals and their homes.
Some zoos give a safe home to animals.
These animals were treated badly in circuses.
Or they were pets that people did not want anymore.
Zoos also do important research.
They study how animals act and learn how to help sick animals.
